title: Marc García
text:
Marc García Renom (born 21 March 1988), commonly known as Chiqui, is an Andorran footballer who plays for Spanish club EC Granollers as a left back.


== Club career ==
Born in Andorra la Vella, Chiqui spent his entire career in the Spanish lower leagues. He started out at SE Eivissa-Ibiza B, representing in quick succession UD Fraga, UD Pomar, Atlético Monzón and UE Vic.
In June 2013, Chiqui signed with Segunda División B club UE Llagostera, being immediately loaned to Palamós CF and then to Cerdanyola del Vallès FC, both from Tercera División.


== International career ==
Chiqui made his debut for Andorra on 29 May 2010, in a 0–4 friendly loss against Iceland.
